links.label: American Studies at the Univ. of Virginia : A Day in Radio (September 21, 1939)

infos.info: (1) Sources differ as to whether Procter & Gamble dropped its long association with the program in 1955 or late 1958, giving way to multiple sponsors during the final years; (2) Charles Paul was the organist; (3) Sound effects were by Russ Gainor, Jerry McCarty and Manny Segal.
